title: CEO
description:
1. Set and Direct the Vision
2. Provide the Proper Resources (CTR)
3. Build the Culture/Values
4. Responsibility for Company Performance
5. The managing director shall be responsible to successfully implement all company policies and to include ensuring that these policies and legal guidelines are communicated from the top down in the company and that this is followed at all times.
6. The managing director shall build and maintain an effective management team as a result he shall adequately delegate and supervise the work of his team, providing guidance and motivation to drive maximum performance.
7. The managing director shall by acting carefully contribute to the interests of the company by seeing to the day-to-day running of the company. 
8. The managing director shall responsible for contract negotiations with business partners and clients as well as for fulfillment and monitoring of the agreements and other obligations of the company. 
9. The managing director shall be responsible for making sure that the company has sufficient liquidity by balancing the company’s cost, time and resources. He may generally on behalf of the company issue credits notes, guarantees and bind on standard terms that are connected to the company’s daily routines. 
10. The managing director shall oversee the company’s financial performance, investments and other business ventures.
11. The managing director is responsible for making sure that the accounts of the company and its financial affairs have been arranged in a reliable manner.
12. The managing director represents the company in matters, which by virtue of law belong to the duties of the managing director. 
13. The managing director shall develop and execute the company’s business strategies in order to attain set goals.
